mapper.select:
SELECT com_id, com_name, com_principal, b.dict_item_name com_source, c.dict_item_name com_industry, d.dict_item_name com_money, e.dict_item_name com_people, com_source, com_people, com_education, com_address FROM company a LEFT JOIN ( SELECT dict_id, dict_item_name FROM base_dict WHERE dict_type_code = '002' ) b ON a.com_source = b.dict_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT dict_id, dict_item_name FROM base_dict WHERE dict_type_code = '011' ) c ON a.com_industry = c.dict_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT dict_id, dict_item_name FROM base_dict WHERE dict_type_code = '010' ) d ON a.com_money = d.dict_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT dict_id, dict_item_name FROM base_dict WHERE dict_type_code = '005' ) e ON a.com_people = e.dict_id
limit #{start},#{rows}
mapper.insert: insert into Company( com_name, com_principal, com_source, com_industry, com_people, com_money, com_education, com_address ) values(#{com_name}, #{com_principal}, #{com_source}, #{com_industry}, #{com_people}, #{com_money}, #{com_education}, #{com_address} )
